monogr.title: Dissertatio Inauguralis Mathematico-Juridica de Usu Artis Conjectandi in Jure, Quam Divina Juvante Gratia Auctoritate & Jussu Magnifici & Amplissimi JCtorum Ordinis in Academia Patria pro Gradu Doctoratus in Utroque Jure legitime consequendo Ad Diem 14 Junii A.C.
